EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You for Joining Pivotal at the Future of Data Roadshow
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://pivotal.io/event/pivotal-cloud-native-roadshow]]> Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for joining Pivotal at the Future of Data roadshow! It was a memorable event and hopefully you walked away feeling inspired about new ways to use data to drive value in your enterprise.
To help you on your digital transformation journey, Pivotal has put together a collection of related resources, including the Pivotal HDB on Hortonworks HDP sandbox, that you can check out here <[[https://pivotal.io/event/future-of-data/resources]]>.
Pivotal and Hortonworks continue to work together to offer enterprises a comprehensive and powerful platform for managing, analyzing and operationalizing data at scale. Watch this webinar <[[http://hortonworks.com/webinar/high-performance-interactive-sql-analytics-machine-learning-hadoop/]]> to learn more about the role of Hadoop Native SQL in turning data into insight and action.
Ready to talk to Pivotal about the future of data at your enterprise? Contact us today <[[mailto:pivotal.io/contact]]>!
Thanks,
The Pivotal Team
